text: Palaeoperca is an extinct genus of prehistoric bony fish that lived from the early to middle Eocene. It was a member of the family Serranidae, which includes the groupers. == References == # Sepkoski, Jack (2002). "A compendium of fossil marine animal genera" . Bulletins of American Paleontology. 363: 1â€“560. Retrieved 2009-02-27. Category:Perciformes Category:Extinct fish Category:Animals of Europe
title: Palaeoperca
